import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { useState,useEffect,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' // import products from '../products' const ProductsScreen = () => { const [products,setProduct]=useState([]); const fetchProduct=async()=>{ const products=await axios.get('/api/products') setProduct(products); } fetchProduct(); const { id:productId }=useParams(); const product=products.find((p) => ( p._id === productId )) //console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: { product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out of Stock' } ) } export default ProductsScreen
